U

update(Observable, Object) - Method in class view.BattlePanel
 
update(Observable, Object) - Method in class view.BattleshipView
According to the BattleshipModel's state, the BattleshipView is updated making the panel corresponding to the BattleshipModel's state visible and making the other panels invisible.
update(Observable, Object) - Method in class view.NewGamePanel
 
update(Observable, Object) - Method in class view.SetShipsPanel
 
update(Observable, Object) - Method in class view.StartLoadPanel
 
updateAllComponents() - Method in class view.BattlePanel
Updates all the components set when BattlePanel is first accessed.
updateAllComponents() - Method in class view.SetShipsPanel
Updates all the components of a SetShipsPanel.
updateButtonGrid() - Method in class view.SetShipsPanel
Whenever a JButton from the button grid is pressed, that grid is updated.
updateDropDownAndButtonsPanel() - Method in class view.SetShipsPanel
Updates the content of the JPanel containing the JComboBoxes.
updateHitsGrid() - Method in class view.BattlePanel
Whenever an enabled JButton from the ships grid is pressed, the grid is updated.
updateShipsGrid() - Method in class view.BattlePanel
Whenever the Computer hits the Player, the JButton corresponding to the chosen coordinates becomes either red if those coordinates match the position of a Player's Ship, or blue otherwise.
upo.battleship.rossi - package upo.battleship.rossi
 
Utility - Class in utils
Utility class containing some useful String arrays used to build SetShipsPanel and BattlePanel.
Utility() - Constructor for class utils.Utility
 
utils - package utils
